product information:
This 17-inch Samsung SyncMaster monitor is well-designed, useful, and made for delivering sharper graphics and taking your user experience up a notch. This Samsung SyncMaster monitor is a good companion for enhancing your user experience thanks to the brighter colors. With its black and silver body, this computer monitor will be a polished upgrade for any computer. The clear liquid crystal technology on the Samsung 710N makes it easy for you to appreciate the reliable picture quality and be more productive with your work. Easily adjust the aspect ratio, sharpness, and contrast to your individual preferences by taking advantage of the easy-to-master controls included with this Samsung SyncMaster monitor. In addition, as this computer monitor comes with an exceptional moderate-sized display, you can make use of the generous screen space and scroll less to read more rows of a spreadsheet. Edit more documents at once without taking up too much desk space thanks to the superior 1280 x 1024 display resolution on the Samsung 710N.
